tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE treatment_plans (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE treatment_plan (
    plan_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE historical_data (
    data_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    sensor_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    temperature FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patient_data (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    heart_rate INT,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE patient_history (
    patient_id INT,
    record_date DATE,
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    treatment_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, record_date)
);

CREATE TABLE Patient (patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  height FLOAT,
  weight FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE IoTDevice (device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_name VARCHAR,
  device_type VARCHAR,
  manufacturer VARCHAR,
  date_activated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE SensorData (sensor_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id UUID,
  sensor_type VARCHAR,
  value FLOAT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE TreatmentPlan (plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  plan_details TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE DiagnosisRecord (record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  diagnosis TEXT,
  doctor VARCHAR,
  date DATE
)
